title: DevOps Engineer Intern
description: Worked on CI/CD pipelines, Docker automation, and AWS deployments.
responsibilities: Implemented automated deployment pipelines using Jenkins and Docker.
Managed AWS services including EC2, S3, Lambda for project deployment.
Optimized system performance and reduced deployment time by 30%.

title: Cybersecurity Trainee
description: Learned and applied vulnerability assessment, penetration testing, and network security.
responsibilities: Performed penetration testing on client networks and systems.
Used tools like Nmap, Metasploit, and Burp Suite for security assessment.
Prepared detailed vulnerability reports with remediation suggestions.

title: IoT & AI Intern
description: Developed IoT prototypes and AI/ML models for smart home and automation projects.
responsibilities: Built smart IoT devices using Raspberry Pi and Arduino.
Implemented ML models for home automation using Python and TensorFlow.
Collaborated with a team of 5 interns to deliver a final working prototype.
